name_localized.en: 2 Queen Beds ADA Room Roll-In Shower
name_localized.es: 2 Queen Beds ADA Room Roll-In Shower

short_description_localized.en: An array of accessibility features welcome you to this 200-square-foot room with two queen beds and a roll-in shower.
short_description_localized.es: An array of accessibility features welcome you to this 200-square-foot room with two queen beds and a roll-in shower.

description_localized.en:
Travel with a friend or the family and know that you’ll have the features you need. This mobility accessible room offers two queen beds and a roll-in shower with grab bars throughout the bathroom. Our breakfast room and fitness center are also accessible, and you can enjoy a daily complimentary continental breakfast before heading out into Manhattan. Max. 4 guests.

Room accessibility features include: low peephole and security latches - low thermostat controls - ADA chair upon request
